data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Kannauj, Uttar Pradesh, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kannauj, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Kannauj, Uttar Pradesh, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kannauj, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Kannauj, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kannauj.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Sonar Khatri people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Kannauj.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 18,223 believers in Kannauj to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,638,377 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Kannauj, Uttar Pradesh, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

location.name: Kannauj
location.people_groups_list: Aghori, Bhanumati, Bania Gahoi, Hurkiya, Kandera
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Aghori (69,000), Bhanumati (2,400), Bania Gahoi (340,000), Hurkiya (4,300), Kandera (19,000)
